hooks.command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
# Auto-format and auto-fix edited Python files with Ruff
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ] && uv run ruff --version >/dev/null 2>&1; then
  uv run ruff format "$file_path" 2>&1 | head -50 >&2 || true
  uv run ruff check --fix "$file_path" 2>&1 | head -50 >&2 || true
fi

echo "$input"

PostToolUse.description: Auto-format and auto-fix edited Python files with Ruff
